Class Gas

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Power
Gas
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Gas extends Power
A class that deals damage to Rats that step over this Power.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daumantas Balakauskas

    • activate

      public void activate(ArrayList<Rat> rats, Tile currentTile)
      Abstract method to let any power know it's time to do something. For Gas - Increase gasTimer of all rats that pass through this Power and spawn new gas around (not on grass Tiles)
      Parameters:
      rats - used to interact with all rats that stepped on the power.
      currentTile - used to remove this Power from Tile.

    • onTick

      public void onTick(ArrayList<Rat> rats, Tile currentTile)
      Abstract method for certain powers that need to activate after a certain amount of time.
      Parameters:
      currentTile - used for calling removeActivePower(this).
      rats - used for updating the rat arraylist every game tick.
